title: Determine rate law from initial rates

content.question: Given the information in the table above, which of the following is the experimental rate law?

choices.label: <math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of X, times the molar concentration of Y 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mtext>[X]</mtext><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of X squared, times the molar concentration of Y 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>X</mtext><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of X, times the molar concentration of Y 2 squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>X</mtext><mtext>]</mtext><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of X squared, times the molar concentration of Y 2 squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mtext>[X]</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[Y</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Rate equals k, times the molar concentration of X, times the molar concentration of Y 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mtext>[X]</mtext><mo>[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.C: Explain the relationship between variables within an equation when one variable changes.
